author: vberta
body:
Implemented in tracking DQM the plot of the tracking efficiency VS dR, where dR is the distance between a track and the caloJets axis. This is a relevant parameter in the core of the jets, where the efficiency drops. Ony tracks with Pt above 1 TeV, dR lower than 0.1 are included in the calculation of the efficiency by default.
@arizzi
title: Implementation of DQM plot: tracking efficiency VS dR(track, jet)
